  • Constructor Details

      public ConfigurationBean()

  • Method Details

    • createDefaultConfigIfNotExistent

      public void createDefaultConfigIfNotExistent(String configKey, int value)
      Creates a default configuration entry if it does not already exist in the database.
      Parameters:
      configKey - The key of the configuration entry.
      value - The value associated with the configuration entry.

    • getConfigValueByKey

      public int getConfigValueByKey(String configKey)
      Retrieves the value of a configuration entry based on the given key.
      Parameters:
      configKey - The key of the configuration entry whose value is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The value associated with the specified configuration key.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - If no configuration entry with the specified key is found.

    • getAllConfiguration

      public List<ConfigurationGetDto> getAllConfiguration()
      Retrieves all configurations from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of ConfigurationGetDto objects representing all configurations.

    • updateConfigValue

      public void updateConfigValue(ConfigurationUpdateDto configUpdateDto) throws InputValidationException, EntityNotFoundException
      Updates the value of a configuration entry based on the provided ConfigurationUpdateDto.
      Parameters:
      configUpdateDto - The DTO containing the updated configuration key and value.
      Throws:
      InputValidationException - If the new configuration value does not meet validation criteria, such as being lower than the minimum session timeout value.
      EntityNotFoundException - If no configuration entry with the specified key is found.
